titleStmt.title: SII 7.22: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 22. (A.R. No. 22 of 1900). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrīḥ . tribhuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ koṉerimelkoṇṭāṉ koṅkāṉa vīracoḻamaṇṭalattu vaṭapūvāṇiyanāṭṭu tāramaṅkalattil nalluṭaiyappar vaitta Akaram śrīlakṣmaṇaccaturvvedimaṅkalattu bhaṭṭarkaḷukku Ivvūril kāraikuḷattāl nirpāyum nilaṅkaḷ Uḷḷavaiyum ceyaperumāḷeriyālum perumārkāmiṇṭaṉeriyā
l nirpāyum kañcumalaināyaṉāyaṉār tevatāṉamāṉa Erikku meṟkku Uḷḷa nilamum kaṇṇantai Eriyāl nīrpāyum taṇṇāyakkaṉErikku vaṭakkuḷḷa nilamum kiḻaippoykaraiyāl nirpāyum nilamum Innāṭṭu kaḷakkuḷattil nāṉkellai yuḻppaṭṭa naṉceai puṉcai nattam Ūruṇi Uḻpaṭṭa Ivaiyum cemappaḷḷiEri Uḻpaṭṭa kuḷaṅkaḷāl nirpāyum nilamu
ḷḷa Ivaiyum kārimaṅkalattil taṅkaḷ kuṭiyiruppu nattamāṉa vāstuvum vāstuśeṣamum Āṟāvatu Āṭimāta mutal taṅkaḷukku mutalaṭaṅka bhūdāṉa Iṟaiyiliyāka tantatu Iṉṉilaṅkaḷāl varum nelkaṭamai kācukaṭaāyam pañcupīli cantuvikkirakam vācalviṉayokam kāṇikkai kāttikaippaccai Āṭippūrappaccai piḷḷaiyārnoṉputtevai Āṉaiccā
lai kutiraippanti karuĀḻttāḻvu taccuttāḻvu taṟiIṟai cekkiṟai taṭṭolitaṭṭārppāṭṭam pācippāṭṭam Oḻukku nir miṉpāṭṭam toloṭṭu Ervari Iṉavari vācalvari Āḷvari nallerutu nalppacu kāṇam Uḷppaṭṭa Ivaiyum variyilār kaṇakkilum kaḻikkumpaṭi colliviṭṭom Iṉṉāḷmutal tāṅkaḷ kaikkoṇṭu kārum pacāṉamum Orupūvum maṟuvum vampuṅ ka⌈
ṭaiypūvum kamukum teṅku vāḻai koḻuntu mañcaḷ Iñci karuṇai karumpu ceṅkaḻunīr Uṭpaṭṭa vāṉpayirum māp palā Iluppai puḷi Uḻppaṭṭa palamaraṅkaḷum pullu varaku tiṉai cāmai Iṟuṅku Āvaṇakkup parutti vaḻutilai pūcaṇi Eḷḷuk koḷḷu payaṟu Avarai tuvarai Uḻppaṭṭa puṉpayirum tāṅkaḷ cetum ceyvittumṅ koḷḷuvārākac colliviṭṭom
Ippaṭikku Ivvolai piṭipāṭāka koṇṭu Atikārakaṇakkilum nāṭṭukkaṇakkilum kaḻippittu kallilum cempilum veṭṭivittukkoṇṭu candrādityavaTc cella Aṉupavittuppotuka Ivai tuñcalūruṭaiyāṉ Eḻuttu Iyāṇṭu Āṟāvatu nāḷ muppattunālu tulyaM Ivai pallavarāyar Eḻuttu
Digital edition of SII 7.22 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
